name: ACH_GRANDMASTER
description: Become a Grand Master.

name: ACH_FLYING
description: Complete the game solo.

name: ACH_LORD_OF
description: Complete the game on Legacy of Bhaal difficulty.

name: ACH_FRIEND_OF
description: Complete the game on Story Mode difficulty.

name: ACH_GODLIKE
description: Increase an attribute score to 25.

name: ACH_UNTOUCHABLE
description: Have an Armor Class of -15 or lower.

name: ACH_LEAVE_NO
description: Finish the game without any party members dying.

name: ACH_SACRIFICES_MUST
description: Finish the game with a full party of dead allies.

name: ACH_JUGGERNAUT
description: Reach 150 Hit Points.

name: ACH_HERO
description: Acquire Heroic reputation.

name: ACH_VILLAIN
description: Acquire Despised reputation.

name: ACH_MURDER
description: Kill 1,000 creatures.

name: ACH_LOREMASTER
description: Have a Lore skill of 100 or more.

name: ACH_OATHBREAKER
description: Become a Fallen Paladin or a Fallen Ranger.

name: ACH_BEST_DAY
description: Have Bless, Chant, and Luck active at the same time.

name: ACH_WORST_DAY
description: Have Disease, Fatigue, and Poison active at the same time.

name: ACH_FRIENDLY_FACES
displayName: Friendly Faces at the Friendly Arm

name: ACH_ALL_THE_OPTIONS
description: Have Neera, Dorn, and Rasaad in the party at the same time.

name: ACH_BACK_TO_BASICS
description: Speak to all the Candlekeep tutors and learn what they have to teach you.

name: ACH_KNOW_THYSELF
description: Help Ammon in the Korlasz family tomb.

name: ACH_FAMILY_SECRETS
description: Discover a secret hidden away in the Korlasz family tomb.

name: ACH_FAR_OUT
description: Summon three creatures to the Prime Material Plane using the Spectacles of Spectacle.

name: ACH_NOT_THE
displayName: Not The Battle We Came For

name: ACH_STAND_ALONE
description: Defeat the elite crusader Ashatiel in a one on one battle.

name: ACH_APPEAL_TO
description: Present evidence of the crusade's crimes to Julann.

name: ACH_DETAILED
description: Find the traitor within the coalition camp.

name: ACH_TRIVIUM
description: Perform a task worthy of the Terrible Trivium.

name: ACH_BREAKING
description: Persuade Rigah to turn against Julann.

name: ACH_IN_THE_NAME_OF_THE_FATHER
displayName: In the Name of the Father

name: ACH_PAINFUL
description: Fail to impress the ancient menhirs with your singing ability.

name: ACH_HES_JUST_MISUNDERSTOOD
description: Side with Tsolak the vampire.

name: ACH_STONE_TO_FLESH
description: Save all the missing refugees in the Coast Way forest.

name: ACH_A_COMPLETE_SET
description: Find all of Takos's missing heirlooms.

name: ACH_WELL_DONE
description: Deal with an angry water elemental.

name: ACH_WHIPPED_INTO
description: Train all of Vigilant Halasan's recruits properly.

name: ACH_FAMILY_REUNION
description: Track down all of Glint's family members.

name: ACH_GET_OUT
description: Get the strange voice out of Neera's head.

name: ACH_HARPERS
description: Aid Khalid with his romantic request.

name: ACH_GRUB_DOUBLED
description: Help M'Khiin find her path.

name: ACH_UNPOPULAR
description: Have Baeloth, Viconia, M'Khiin, Dorn, and Edwin in the same party.

name: ACH_NEWER
description: Have Corwin, Glint, M'Khiin, and Voghiln in the same party.

name: ACH_THE_OG
description: Reunite with old friends.

name: ACH_EXPLORER
description: Explore all unique encounters.

name: ACH_DARKSEER
description: Use infravision to navigate an area of darkness.

name: ACH_IM_A_WIZARD
displayName: I'm A Wizard and That Looks...

name: ACH_ALL_THE_ALLIES
description: Recruit all the bonus allies possible for the final battle.

name: ACH_ALL_THE_ENEMIES
description: Fight all the bonus enemies possible at the final battle.
